name: Hells Divide
description:
This is a hack n' slash game where you plunder through 6 randomly generated stages of hell. The objective is to collect enough souls in the level, once done, you can proceeed to the next stage, at which point you pick one out of three upgrades.

Like in the true fashion of game jam games, past the final stage is gameplay unknown to both you, and the developer.

Credits :

Jason Beetham

Phill Damaskin
